document.full_text: google inc will keep the focus of its chrome operating system on notebooks, and has no immediate plan to make it available on tablets or to merge with its popular android software for smartphones, said a senior executive.
document.title: google says chrome to power only notebooks for now
lines_and_colors: google inc will keep the focus of its chrome operating system on notebooks, and has no immediate plan to make it available on tablets or to merge with its popular android software for smartphones, said a senior executive.
